amendment.description: An amendment numbered 46 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to ensure none of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Securities and Exchange Commission to carry out an enforcement action related to a crypto asset transaction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Emmer amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Emmer amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Emmer amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
